price: (Yosef asomfoͻ) no kaa sε: “Ɛneε (obi a yεbɛhunu kuruwa no wͻ ne hͻ no) asotwee bεn na εsεsε yεde ma no (sε εda adi) sε moyε nkontompofoͻ a?”
arabic: قَالُواْ فَمَا جَزَٰٓؤُهُۥٓ إِن كُنتُمۡ كَٰذِبِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qālū famā jazāuhu in kuntum kādhibīna
